Title: Srabon Megher Din
Writer: Humayun Ahmed (novel), Humayun Ahmed (dialogue), Humayun Ahmed (screenplay)
Actors: Meher Afroz Shaon, Mukti, Zahid Hasan, Mahfuz Ahmed
Plot: The second movie directed by Humayun Ahmed. A village drama interweave around a charming girl, a folk singer, his love interest and the local aristocratic family's involvement, the movie provide with some beautiful songs.
